biotools.summary: Disambiguating two species in next generation sequencing data from grafted samples. Operates on DNA or RNA-seq alignments to the two species and separates the components at very high sensitivity and specificity.

bioschemas.name: Disambiguate
bioschemas.summary: Disambiguating two species in next generation sequencing data from grafted samples. Operates on DNA or RNA-seq alignments to the two species and separates the components at very high sensitivity and specificity.
